text:
I needed to port apr to an OpenWrt router with a broadcom 2.4 mips chipset, as a prerequisite for log4cxx. The configure script failed on multiple occasions, so I made a few ugly hacks to get it to work. In the end it compiled, but produced only segfaults on the target machine.

So I gave up and decided to go without apr and log4cxx.

I can't propose a fix, but maybe the build process for apr can be made a bit more cross-compiling friendly in future versions.
creator: mflorian@lafka.net

text: Please include any details you have of the build or run-time failures; otherwise, there's practically no chance that anyone will take action.
